description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Remake definitive of the "paddles game". All the playability of the original one, adding special movements and several configurable ways of game. With a 'dazzling' audio-visual update. (Version 1.0.0.0)
description.short: Remake definitive of the "paddles game". All the playability of the original one, adding special movements and several configurable ways of game. With a 'dazzling' audio-visual update. (Version 1.0.0.0)
